tasks.label: Build (xcodebuild)
tasks.command: if [ -d "${workspaceFolder}/myApp.xcodeproj" ]; then xcodebuild -project "${workspaceFolder}/myApp.xcodeproj" -target myApp -configuration Debug build; else echo "Missing myApp.xcodeproj. Run the openFrameworks Project Generator first."; exit 1; fi

tasks.label: Run (Debug)
tasks.command: if [ -x "${workspaceFolder}/bin/myAppDebug.app/Contents/MacOS/myAppDebug" ]; then "${workspaceFolder}/bin/myAppDebug.app/Contents/MacOS/myAppDebug" ${input:appArgs}; else echo "Missing app bundle. Run the build task first."; exit 1; fi
